EmailTemplate.subject: Special Pricing on TFE731 Rotor Replacement with Dallas Airmotive
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://dallasairmotive.com/]]>
If you haven’t replaced affected LPT1 rotor assemblies on your TFE731-4/-5 engine, there has never been a better time than now to schedule your maintenance with Dallas Airmotive. Through August 30, 2019 Dallas Airmotive is pleased to offer special discounted pricing on the replacement turbine rotor for the TFE731 engine in an effort to help operators avoid maintenance delays due to parts shortages as the 2020 deadline approaches.
Contact Dallas Airmotive, a Honeywell Authorized Service Center and the 2018 Americas Channel Partner of the Year winner, to learn more about this special offering! Get in touch by phone at (214) 304-2726 <tel:2143042426> or online by clicking below.
I'M READY TO SCHEDULE MY ROTOR REPLACEMENT! <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/TFE731.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_dallasairmotive_tfe731&utm_content=customer+form+fill]]>
